item.description:
Dhruv is going to show us a Solar Thermal Collector dish with automated solar tracking. Thanks, Dhruv!

The address is 73 Centre Rd, Shirley MA.
This is about 1 mile from MBTA's Shirley stop on the Fitchburg commuter line.
The 11:20am train from North Station will reach at Shirley by 12:30pm.
You can call Dhruv's cell (630-667-5033) or mine (617-680-2390) to arrange a pickup.
The return train is at 3pm.

Cheers. And see you soon.
- Josh

Hi Joshua,
item.how_to_find_us: I'm 6' 4" and look like my picture.
item.name: Field Trip to Solar Thermal Collector
